title: Sooo... the skins are coming tomorrow?
body: 5.3 patch is at 5am on Thursday yet the Nidalee, Jinx and Katarina skins are still not available... ([scheduled to be released during 5.2](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-52-notes#patch-upcoming-skins) ))

replies.body: Yeah idk it's annoying that they jerk our chains by saying 5.2 then release it like a few hours before 5.3, I mean if they were gonna wait that long why not put the skins in 5.3 to begin with?

> [{quoted}](name=Niji,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gVIo6JOX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-10T11:49:40.907+0000)
>
> Yeah idk it's annoying that they jerk our chains by saying 5.2 then release it like a few hours before 5.3, I mean if they were gonna wait that long why not put the skins in 5.3 to begin with?

because it's funny watching people complain on boards.
same thing will probs happen with DJ sona
Does anyone know when Heartseeker Varus becomes available?

they are out
as promised in 5.2
